Package enedis.romaindavid.com.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • enedis.romaindavid.com.game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mastermind, RecherchePlusMoins
    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    main class of the application: - 1 main method for each mode: - challenger for the "Challenger" mode - Defender for the "Defender" mode - dual for the "Duel" mode - 1 specific main method by type of player on entering the combination: - playerProposal when it is the player who must seize a proposal - pcProposal when it is the computer that must enter a proposal.
